TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Memory`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class Memory

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: 代表連續的記憶體區域。

span.span: Represents a contiguous region of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像是，`Memory`代表連續的記憶體區域。Like , `Memory` represents a contiguous region of memory. 不同於，不過`Memory`不是[ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types)。Unlike , however, `Memory` is not a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types). 這表示`Memory`而可放置在 managed 堆積，無法。This means that `Memory` can be placed on the managed heap, whereas cannot. 如此一來，`Memory`結構沒有相同的限制執行個體。As a result, the `Memory` structure does not have the same restrictions as a instance. 特別之處在於：In particular: - 它可用來當做類別中的欄位。It can be used as a field in a class. - 可使用於`await`和`yield`界限。It can be used across `await` and `yield` boundaries. 除了`Memory`，您可以使用代表不可變或唯讀記憶體。In addition to `Memory`, you can use to represent immutable or read-only memory.

summary.span: 建立 物件的控制代碼。

A handle for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 另請參閱See also 記憶體回收行程不會將記憶體移到傳回處置物件。The garbage collector will not move the memory until the returned object is disposed. 這可讓您擷取及使用的記憶體位址。This enables you to retrieve and use the memory's address.

exception.span: 不可以將含有非基本 (非 Blittable) 成員的執行個體固定。

span.span: An instance with non-primitive (non-blittable) members cannot be pinned.

remarks.format: 因為 < xref=System.Memory%601.ToArray%2A > 方法的呼叫會執行堆積配置，，它通常應該避免使用。Because a call to the method performs a heap allocation, it should generally be avoided. 不過，它是功能的有時為了利用僅適用於陣列。However, it is sometimes necessary to take advantage of functionality that is only available for arrays. 每次呼叫`ToArray`方法會傳回新的陣列。Each call to the `ToArray` method returns a new array.
